project.name: OpenGitOps
project.description: OpenGitOps is a CNCF Sandbox project to define a vendor-neutral, principle-led meaning of GitOps. This will establish a foundation for interoperability between tools, conformance, and certification through lasting programs, documents, and code.
project.license_type: Content is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 License, and any code is licensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
